com.camerontec.util.jar

Class JarUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.jar.JarUtils

  • public final class JarUtils
extends Object
    Utilities related to Jar files.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributeFromManifest

        public static String getAttributeFromManifest(JarFile jarFile,
                                              String attributeName)
                                       throws ManifestAccessException
        Reads an attribute from the manifest in the given Jar file.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the Jar file to read from
        attributeName - the name of the attribute to read from the manifest
        Returns:
        the attribute value in the manifest, or null if there is no attribute with this name in the manifest
        Throws:
        ManifestAccessException - if the manifest could not be retrieved from the given JarFile

      • getCopyrightFromManifest

        public static String getCopyrightFromManifest(JarFile jarFile)
                                       throws ManifestAccessException
        Reads the Copyright attribute from the manifest in the given Jar file.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the Jar file to read from
        Returns:
        the value of the Copyright attribute in the manifest, or null if there is no such attribute in the manifest
        Throws:
        ManifestAccessException - if the manifest could not be retrieved from the given JarFile

      • getImplementationVersionFromManifest

        public static String getImplementationVersionFromManifest(JarFile jarFile)
                                                   throws ManifestAccessException
        Reads the Implementation-Version attribute from the manifest in the given Jar file.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the Jar file to read from
        Returns:
        the value of the Implementation-Version attribute in the manifest, or null if there is no such attribute in the manifest
        Throws:
        ManifestAccessException - if the manifest could not be retrieved from the given JarFile

      • getImplementationVersionFromManifestRaw

        public static String getImplementationVersionFromManifestRaw(JarFile jarFile)
        Reads the Implementation-Version attribute without a possible postfixes like "-SNAPSHOT from the manifest in the given Jar file. This can be used when checking the version in a license file against the version of the application. Any exception while reading the manifest is ignored and will result in a null version.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the Jar file to read from
        Returns:
        the value of the Implementation-Version attribute in the manifest, or null if there is no such attribute in the manifest

      • getImplementationRevisionFromManifest

        public static String getImplementationRevisionFromManifest(JarFile jarFile)
                                                    throws ManifestAccessException
        Reads the Implementation-Revision attribute from the manifest in the given Jar file.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the Jar file to read from
        Returns:
        the value of the Implementation-Revision attribute in the manifest, or null if there is no such attribute in the manifest
        Throws:
        ManifestAccessException - if the manifest could not be retrieved from the given JarFile

        public static JarFile getJar(Class<?> clazz)
        Returns the Jar file from which the given class was loaded.
        Parameters:
        clazz - a class.
        Returns:
        the JarFile object representing the Jar file from which clazz was loaded, or null if clazz was not loaded from a Jar file

      • getClassLoadingLocation

        Returns the path to the directory or Jar file from which a given class was loaded.
        Parameters:
        clazz - a class
        Returns:
        the path to the directory or Jar file from which clazz was loaded or null if this information cannot be extracted

      • dumpJarFileInformationToStdOut

        public static void dumpJarFileInformationToStdOut(Class<?> clazz)
                                           throws ManifestAccessException
        Dumps the attributes of Jar file containing the specified class to stdout.
        Parameters:
        clazz - a class
        Throws:
        ManifestAccessException - if the manifest could not be retrieved from the given JarFile

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws ManifestAccessException
        Main function which dumps the attributes of the Jar file containing this class to stdout. So any Jar file containing JarUtils.class can be "executed" like this

        java -jar filename.jar

        to display the jar file information provided that JarUtils has been added as Main-Class attribute to the Jar file's manifest.

        Parameters:
        args - ignored
        Throws:
        ManifestAccessException - if the manifest could not be retrieved from the given JarFile
